betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oYou can use the wizards book on the parasecta and dramix altar to summon the two bosses.

§fThe twilight horde must pay for this! 
This place has rulers, time to get rid of them! I have serious doubts I can do anything to address the vastness of this place, or even change how thing are here, but hopefully breaking the chain of command can bring some relief to the enslaved beings of this world.
Hopefully the Twilight Horde will bring their wrath on me instead of them. I am starting to doubt my capabilities, though. Fighting big insects? That I can do. Destroying an infinite fortress sitting somewhere in a space-time anomaly? No idea how to deal with that!
It is evident I will have to come up with better tools for both understanding and using the forces of this universe. It is clear I need to know more!
